thread.title: BenB
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by BenB

author: BenB
title: BenB
text:
Contacted PotV and ordered a Focus Vape Pro as a gift.
Excellent Price, free shipping, free 4 part grinder and free Tightvac container.
Ordered on Tuesday and the package arrived the following day! The packaging was awesome too.
The transaction itself was smooth and the shipment tracking immediate. The freebies were top-o-the-line. The quality of the 4 piece grinder was a very nice surprise. Smooth threading, quality aluminum and nice looking to boot. The Tightvac container was great too. Not the usual low end freebies.
Impressive transaction all the way around. Thanks!
